headline: Equinix (EQIX): Has the Recent Share Price Pullback Opened Up a Valuation Opportunity?
summary: Equinix (EQIX) has quietly slipped about 6% over the past month and roughly 18% in the past year, putting the data center giant back on value investors’ radar despite solid double digit earnings growth. See our latest analysis for Equinix. That slide comes after a long stretch of strength, with the share price still up solidly on a three year total shareholder return basis, even as year to date share price momentum has clearly faded around the current 744.08 dollars level.
